categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Peter Geddis (born 1937) is an English stage and screen actor. Geddis joined the Royal Shakespeare Company in 1962, appearing alongside Ronald Falk in a 1963 performance of Henry IV.
He was an Associate Artist from 1962 to 1980.
He played Captain Raymus Antilles in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
